bers By Fighters Air Ground Total Air Ground Total Air Ground Total By All Types Air Ground Total 1942 Jul 2 2 2 2 Aug Sep 1 1 Oct 8 8 Nov 6 5 Dec 19 1 Total 1942 36 6 =223 11 20 42 I3I36 1 1 1 10 13 22 1 16 9 8 11 43 2 18 24 81 11 1943 Jan 74 74 33 30 63 56 1 Feb 47 47 33 6 39 57 2342 55 25 92 123 3262 10 43 14 36 65 11 76 35 158 57 163 31 194 57 137 6 143 Mar 63 12 75 21 12 33 103 103 187 24 211 Apr 75 100 175 27 2 29 319 319 421 102 523 May 107 7 114 30 41 71 132 33 165 269 81 350 Jun 81 17 98 37 5 42 115 Jul 89 49 138 36 14 50 125 Aug 308 · 308 114 - 114 117 23 12 127 233 34 267 125 250 63 313 63 180 539 63 602 Sep 124 42 166 88 90 178 102 37 139 314 169 483 Oct 64 53 117 25 42 67 81 25 106 170 120 290 Nov 84 22 106 9 33 42 21 6 27 114 61 175 Dec 128 3 131 1 3 4 42 12 54 171 18 189 Total 1943 1,244 305 1,549 454 278 732 1,270 189 1,459 2,968 772 3,740 1944 Jan 135 135 15 15 170 170 320 320 Feb 230 19 249 14 14 111 3 114 355 Mar 105 74 179 2 6 8 103 17 120 210 Apr 429 202 631 224 103 327 653 305 May 242 38 280 190 62 252 432 25000 377 307 958 100 532 Jun 226 20 246 · 285 31 316 511 51 562 Jul 336 39 375 1 1 376 120 496 713 159 872 Aug 122 44 166 4 4 151 277 428 273 325 598 Sep 13 5 18 18 215 233 31 220 251 Oct 2 Nov 3 10 13 7 Dec 48 48 3 Total 1944 1,889 451 2,340 44 10 54 2734 60 197 257 62 197 259 34 32 66 44 42 86 38 28 66 89 28 117 1,760 1,085 2,845 3,693 1,546 5,239 1945 Jan Feb Mar Apr 61 1 9 8 17 5 15 ∞ ∞ 8 8 8 8 8 5 105 68 May Total 1945 19 1 9 8 17 6 6 189 79 268 2.35 19 27 9 19 28 18 123 119 26 145 42 110 68 42 110 204 87 291 Grand Total 3,178 770 3,948 510 306 816 3,300 1,364 4,664 7,003 2,494 9,497   ## p. 666 (#690) ############################################    ## p. 667 (#691) ############################################  Appendix 28 Gasoline Consumption in the European Theater of Operations August 1942 to May 1945 (thousands of gallons) Heavy Med/Lt Bomber Bomber Fighter Total 1942 Aug 274 Sep 439 Oct 710 Nov 1,303 Dec 876 Total 1942 3,602 103 19
